name: Sosius
overview:
Simply the best way to work and collaborate online.

Sosius is a award winning online collaboration environment which helps businesses become more efficient and intelligent. With Sosius, users can create custom workspaces and invite others to connect and collaborate through the use of our powerful information sharing, social networking, and organization tools.

In todayâ€™s constantly changing business world, companies are continually facing challenges as a result of downsizing and budget restraints. Yet, despite these obstacles productivity is relatively expected to remain consistent and in many cases increase.

Through the use of our solution, companies can receive immediate benefits and costs savings by among others includes reducing travel, promoting interoffice collaboration and workflow, and improving decision quality. Industries, such as insurance can quickly and systematically move paper-based manual processes to the Sosius environment. By doing so, an insurance company can establish a single, stand alone platform in which employees to can interact and excel in their jobs, all while promoting teamwork, setting stringent approval processes, and reducing effort.

Above and beyond, Sosius offers a wealth of other tools and functionality far exceeding that of our competition. These tools range from company blogs and discussion boards to project management tools to task automation.â€
